One question about battles and attacks: Are we using one attack per
turn or many at a time?

I have noticed that in some attacks, people are doing multiple atacks
at once ie Firing rockets and cannons, or firing several times at once.
I do not mean this as a put down, but I just want to be sure I know how
it works here. Both Rodimus and Cyclonus have ALOT of firepower, and it
would appear that firing everything at once will make that battle very
quick and very messy. 

I guess I come from table top RPG's and MUSHes where attacks took place
round by round, you defended once and attacked once and then let the
other person do the same. In the toons it was rare for more then one
kind of attack to come from a specific robot. 

Does this make sense? Again this is not a rant but I am making sure I
have it right. If we are doing multiple attacks at once, then no
problem. But then I will have to adjust my fighting style here. If you
notice I have generally been doing one defence and one attack at a time
per character. 

Preston
